title: Eye Innovations Logo Font
content:
Hello, I’d greatly appreciate your help with this one. My client need her logo re-created and she keeps telling me to use the “Papyrus” font. But this is not papyrus and I can’t find a font with a similar name. I have not only searched all my fonts but also looked at Dafont etc... I have even tried out the Whatthefont tool - with no success...

You can see the logo here: [http://www.eyeinnovations.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091121205341/http:/www.eyeinnovations.net/ "http://www.eyeinnovations.net/")

The font in question is the “Eye Innovations” logo.  
Thank you so much for your help.

Amalthea
author: LadyAmalthea

comments.content: That you, you’re amazing!!!!! You don’t know how much time you saved me.

1) If you want a more professional substitute look at this:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/fllw-terracotta/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091121205341/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/fllw-terracotta/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/fllw-terracotta/")  
2) FWIW, there’s another Isadora:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/search/isadora/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091121205341/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/isadora/fonts/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/isadora/fonts/")

hhp
